holidays.title: National Hot Fudge Sundae Day
holidays.description: Raise your spoons for National Hot Fudge Sundae Day!

holidays.title: Annexation of Guanacaste
holidays.description: Join the celebrations of the Annexation of Guanacaste to Costa Rica, formerly known as Nicoya.

holidays.title: Carousel Day
holidays.description: We’re about to relive some of our merriest memories on Carousel Day.

holidays.title: Commemoration of the Assault on Moncada
holidays.description: Fidel Castro marked the failed assault of Moncada as the beginning of his revolution.

holidays.title: Culinarians Day
holidays.description: A perfect day to appreciate chefs and cooks who enhance your culinary experience!

holidays.title: Feast of Saint James the Apostle
holidays.description: Today we join our brothers in Spain as they honor Saint James the Apostle.

holidays.title: Fiesta de Santiago (Nicaragua)
holidays.description: Join in the festivities and fun activities as we join Nicaraguans in Fiesta de Santiago.

holidays.title: Guanacaste Day
holidays.description: It’s Guanacaste Day! Join this beautiful Costa Rican province in celebrating through music, food, and more.

holidays.title: Health and Happiness with Hypnosis Day
holidays.description: Discover how hypnotherapy can help you improve your overall health and happiness.

holidays.title: International Red Shoe Day
holidays.description: Wear your reds to show your solidarity and appreciation for Lyme disease patients everywhere.

holidays.title: National Clay Day
holidays.description: Uncover the achievements of some of the Clays who have made history.

holidays.title: National Drowning Prevention Day
holidays.description: Observe this day to raise awareness about life-saving measures that can help prevent future drownings.

holidays.title: National Hire a Veteran Day
holidays.description: This day aims to teach people about the value of hiring a veteran.

holidays.title: National Houston Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the strength of mind and spirit exhibited by people named Houston.

holidays.title: National Merry Go Round Day
holidays.description: A highlight of amusement parks, these rides are still widely popular across America and the globe.

holidays.title: National Thread the Needle Day
holidays.description: “Thread the needle” has many meanings in English so this day invites different kinds of celebrations.

holidays.title: National Wine and Cheese Day
holidays.description: One of the most basic, yet classic food-and-drink pairings is wine and cheese.

holidays.title: Puerto Rican Constitution Day
holidays.description: Learn how Puerto Rico is fighting for full citizenship rights and autonomy even after centuries.

holidays.title: St James TG
holidays.description: Observe Saint James the Great (T.G.) to honor St. James, an Apostle of Jesus.

holidays.title: Tunisia Republic Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the abolishment of the monarchy on Tunisia Republic Day.

holidays.title: World Drowning Prevention Day
holidays.description: Anyone can drown but no one should. It's time to learn water safety measures.

holidays.title: Dennis McKinley’s Birthday
holidays.description: McKinley is a successful businessman and reality star. He is the real deal.

holidays.title: Estelle Getty’s Birthday
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the legendary actress and comedian on her birthday.

holidays.title: Finn Bálor’s Birthday
holidays.description: This wrestling champion is the human embodiment of fighting until you succeed!

holidays.title: Hasan Piker’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rising streamer has gained fans all over the world and he is not stopping soon.

holidays.title: Jackie Christie’s Birthday
holidays.description: The reality television star comes across as a talented and driven personality.

holidays.title: Juwany Roman’s Birthday
holidays.description: The young Snapchat star is keeping fans around the world entertained with his funny videos.
